overview: Based on Luke 19 where Jesus tells a few Pharisees that if the people don't cry out, the rocks will. The story begins in a world where people are not talking about Jesus. Suddenly, a rock starts talking to a teenager and tries to get him to tell others about Jesus. He thinks he must be going crazy - and so does his mother. Then he feels ashamed. Finally he decides to try and obey and see what happens...
title: The Rock
